nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns winning vote option in held voting according to vote quorum
If voteQuorum is 50, any majority of votes will win
If voteQuorum is 24, only 25 votes out of 100 is enough for Include to be winning option
   * @return Winning vote option
nodes.name: winningVoteOption

challengerReward().details: Returns token reward amount belonging to a challenger

isWinningOptionInclude().details: Returns whether Include is winning vote option
isWinningOptionInclude().return: True if Include is winning option

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

status().details: Returns current status of a registry entry

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

voteReward(address).details: Returns token reward amount belonging to a voter for voting for a winning option

votedWinningVoteOption(address).details: Returns whether voter voted for winning vote option
votedWinningVoteOption(address).return: True if voter voted for a winning vote option

winningVoteOption().details: Returns winning vote option in held voting according to vote quorum If voteQuorum is 50, any majority of votes will win If voteQuorum is 24, only 25 votes out of 100 is enough for Include to be winning option

winningVoteOptionAmount().details: Returns amount of votes for winning vote option

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
